Description:
Essential Duties and Responsibilities Ensures all merchandise are stored under optimal conditions and are ready for issuing.
Attending meetings with vendors and taking minutes.
Placing and tracking orders.
Assisting with analyses and reports.
Arranging meetings with stakeholders.
Assisting with the inspection of goods.
Assisting with negotiation strategies and making recommendations.
Maintaining knowledge of market/industry trends. Makes oneself available during physical inventories taken by the Finance Department.
Identifying opportunities for cost savings through strategic sourcing techniques such as offshore procurement.
Reviewing purchase orders and other documents to ensure that they comply with company policies and procedures.
Recommending changes to purchasing procedures that would improve efficiency or reduce costs.Required Skills –Demonstrated ability to interact with customers, employees and third parties that reflects highly on the hotel, the brand and the Company.
Good CommunicationQualifications –Graduation/ Post Graduation in Accounting, Purchasing or related field.Experience –Minimum 6 years related experience in hotel purchasing only.
